message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9500.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $9000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.
I appreciate the effort to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $8800. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be very happy with this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to get the best deal I can.
I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product for $8400. It's getting close to my minimum, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still thinking $8000 is a fair price. If we can't meet there, I'll have to consider other options.
